name: Bubblusion
description:
In this game, you are a traveler who entered a dreamland. You will need to collect petals to give a rose to a character to get to the end. This game aims at creating a relaxing, romantic, and chill experience with visuality, music and sounds. Instead of making complicated mechanism, we kept the interaction simple.

The game contains two levels, the player will complete a puzzle to collect the petals in the first level. After collecting the petals of a flower, the player can enter the second level through the waterfall.

In the second level, the player enters the world underwater and needs to find the jellyfish to give the flower to, which will finally lead the player to the end.

- This is VR game made by My Linh, Rebecca, Zhicun

- You will need a Quest2 to install the game

—————————————————————————————————————————

My Linh: models, scene design, scripts, debug

Rebecca: models, scene design, sounds, music

Zhicun: models, scene design, shaders

Learn more about devlog & postmortem here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1M_g3dEwdAHsbd83RJTf1fQN2gdvx71BMna01vnFuUiM/...

—————————————————————————————————————————
